document.full_text: algerian president abdelaziz bouteflika promised on friday to ensure free elections, amend the constitution and end jailing of journalists -- moves aimed at preventing local unrest turning into a national uprising.
document.title: algerian president promises major political reforms
lines_and_colors: algerian president abdelaziz bouteflika promised on friday to ensure free elections, amend the constitution and end jailing of journalists -- moves aimed at preventing local unrest turning into a national uprising.
